pages.text: Omo wa, shitashiku jihi to man'etsu o atae rare, kare-ra no tame ni eien no shifuku no rakuen no kippo o atae rareru
Kare-ra wa eien ni sono naka ni sumudearou. Arra no omoto ni wa saidai no hosho ga aru

Shinko suru mono yo, moshi anata gata no chichi matawa kyodai ga, shinko yori fushinjin o konomunaraba, kare-ra o shitashi tomo to shite wa naranai. Moshi anata gata no naka, kare-ra o shitashi tomo to suru mono ga areba, sorera wa fugi no todearu

Itte yaru ga i. `Anata gata no chichi,-ko, kyodai, anata gata no tsuma, kin Tadashi, anata gata no teniireta zaisan, anata gataga fukeiki ni naru koto o osoreru shobai, i ni kanatta sumai ga, arra to shito to kare no michi no tame ni funto doryoku suru yori mo anata gata ni tori konomashinaraba, arra ga meirei o kudasa reru made mate. Arra wa okite ni somuita min o michibika renai

Arra wa ikuta no sen'eki, mata funain no (gassen no)-bi ni oite mo, tashikani anata gata o tasuke rareta. Sonotoki anata gata wa tazei o tanomi ni shitaga, sore wa nani mo yakudatazu, daichi wa ano yo ni hiroinoni anata gata no tame ni wa semaku natte, anata gata wa tsuini se o mukete taikyaku shita

Sonogo arra wa, shito to shinja-tachi no ue ni kare no yasuragi o kudashi, mata anata gata ni wa mienakattaga, gunzei o tsukawashite fushinjin'na-sha-tachi o chobatsu sa reta. Ko no yo ni kare wa, fushin-sha ni mukui rareru
